francais: Il n y a pas de chemin ici.
english: There is no path out of here.

francais: Vous prenez un peu de repos et retrouvez du courage.
english: You take a moment to rest, and recover your strength.

francais: Vous etes deja en bonne sante.
english: You are already at full health
Your wounds start to feel better!

francais: Il n y a rien a ramasser ici.
english: There is nothing here to pick up.

english: Press the key next to an item to use it, or Esc to cancel.

english: Press SPACE to validate, ESC to quit this mode.
